1.0.0.name: wordpress/social-bar
1.0.0.description:
This plugin lets you to display Facebook, Twitter, G+ and LinkedIn bar as widget on sidebar with the themes that supports sidebar or Footer

It is very light weight and doesn't too many javascript codes, just give user option to share or follow

Note: Demo of the widget http://ujwolbastakoti.info
